name: crawler-2.0
description: ## Process  -> Fetch url from database (sorted by citations)   -> Fetch page   -> Get title, description (and optionally text on the page)   -> Get links on the page   -> Parse links (remove # and ? tags at the end of the url and disregard "about:blank"-urls)  -> Check which links are already in the database (+1 citation)  -> Add the new links to the database  -> Repeat
